hanzi-su-wiki:
両

Значения

Оба, два

Мнемоника

  • Аптекарские весы с двумя уравновешенными чашками.

  • Торговец рыбой несёт коромысло с товаром на обоих плечах.

Варианты

两, 兩, 㒳
purpleculture_pinyin:
liǎng
Japanese variant of 两
Японский вариант из двух
rtega_mnemonic:
両両RS
X		both, old Japanese coin, unit for wagons (輛)
  • scale with both sides in balance
 共 双; 衝 斤; 満

両両RS两兩two, both, pair, couple, a tael, ounce
  • scale or yolk for oxen: → 両 or 兩 or 两
 共 双; 衝 斤; 満
heisig_constituent: both, street, nail, spike, belt, shovel
heisig_story: Ceiling . . . belt . . . mountain. Note that the writing order follows the order in which the primitives are given here.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: both, old Japanese coin, counter for carriages (e.g.,in a train), two
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: как, старая японская монета, счетчик для вагонов (например, в поезде), два
koohiiStory1: Primatives celing; belt; mountain as per Cumulative Errata. See volfy post for link. Both effective ways to commit suicide, hang your self from the celing with your belt or jump off a mountain.
koohiiStory2: Both of Tiger Wood´s initials is the logo on his belt... 　　　　　　　　RTK2:　リョウ　両親　りょうしん(one´s parents).
jp_example_words:
両極(りょうきょく): both extremities, north and south poles, positive and negative poles
両立(りょうりつ): compatibility, coexistence, standing together
両替(りょうがえ): change, money exchange
両側(りょうがわ): both sides
両方(りょうほう): both
両親(りょうしん): parents, both parents
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Under the ground, which you dug into, you found two great finds. You found both a mountain and a head, two strange things to find underground.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You'll want to focus on the part where you find both, not so much the things themselves. Think about how you can't believe you did so well finding both things at once. Usually you only find one or the other when you're searching.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: But, you dig too deep and water flows into where you are. Your only hope is a row (りょう) boat floating off in the distance.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Also think... "What's that row boat doing here?" But, it's your only hope, so you have to focus on it really hard.
Ru_Meaning: both, old Japanese coin, counter for carriages (e.g., in a train), two
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the one (一) and the mountain (山) are both wide (冂)

両字的基本解释

両
liǎng
古同“两”。

両字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎng］
同“兩1”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“兩”，《白袍记》、《东牕记》、《目连记》、《金瓶梅》作“両”。按，亦为日本用汉字。
[②]［liàng］
同“兩2”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“兩”，《白袍记》、《东牕记》、《目连记》、《金瓶梅》作“両”。按，亦为日本用汉字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎng］
Same as "Two 1".
"Song Yuan since Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Two", "White Robe Ji", "Dong Yan Ji", "Mu Lian Ji", "Jin Ping Mei" as "Nian". Press, it is also a Chinese character used in Japan.
[②]［liàng］
Same as "Two 2".
"Song Yuan since Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Two", "White Robe Ji", "Dong Yan Ji", "Mu Lian Ji", "Jin Ping Mei" as "Nian". Press, it is also a Chinese character used in Japan.

liǎng
яп. вм. 两

両

Значения

Оба, два

Мнемоника

  • Аптекарские весы с двумя уравновешенными чашками.

  • Торговец рыбой несёт коромысло с товаром на обоих плечах.

Варианты

两, 兩, 㒳

Radicals: 一, 冂, 山  (ground, head, mountain)
Meaning Mnemonic
Under the ground, which you dug into, you found two great finds. You found both a mountain and a head, two strange things to find underground.
You'll want to focus on the part where you find both, not so much the things themselves. Think about how you can't believe you did so well finding both things at once. Usually you only find one or the other when you're searching.
Reading Mnemonic
But, you dig too deep and water flows into where you are. Your only hope is a row (りょう) boat floating off in the distance.
Also think... "What's that row boat doing here?" But, it's your only hope, so you have to focus on it really hard.
